name: Jumper (itch) (RocketFoxGames)
description:
Not your grandma’s arcade game. 

Enter Jumper, a lightning fast blast from the past electronic assault on your senses soaked in pure neon. Prepare for a thrilling ride as you jump through waves of enemies hell bent on your destruction. Experience pure adrenaline as you dodge, weave, and blast your way to the arena boss for a final test of your skill, reflexes, and might. Warning, satisfaction guaranteed!

Features

Press "Right Trigger" to activate Bullet Time ability!

Explosive arena bosses!

High score with ranking system!

  • Seamlessly transition between two fighting styles!
  • Use a variety of weapons!
  • Appropriate levels of retina blasting neon!
Controls

Due to the nature of the game, Jumper requires the use of a controller to play. Keyboard and mouse controls are NOT supported.

Left Stick - Move

Right Stick - Shoot

Right Trigger - Bullet Time Ability

Download Instructions

Click the "Download Now" button at the top of the page to download the file and unzip it to your preferred location. Click on the Jumper .exe application to run the game.

Future

Jumper is in active development and is being worked on full time. We would love for you to help! Please leave feedback either here on our itch.io page, or by using the feedback button upon exiting the demo. In the future we hope for Jumper to have:

More Game Modes: Arcade, Time Attack, Boss Rush, Endless, etc.

More bosses

More enemies

Procedurally generated levels

FAQ What controllers have we tested for?

We have tested controllers for Xbox One, Series X/S, PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5, as well as various off brand wired controllers. If you find that your controller does not work, please let us know!

What to do about bugs?

Jumper is still in active development and our hope is that you can join the process by playing the demo and letting us know what you think. If you encounter any bugs, please let us know!

How to contact us? 

Discord

Facebook

Email (If the link isn't working, just use rocketfoxgames@gmail.com)

Youtube.com@rocketfoxgames

Where's the full release?

This itch.io page is for the demo only. Jumper is in active development and being worked on full time by a team of two developers. We will post an update about the full release in the future!

What platforms will Jumper be on?

Currently Jumper has been built specifically for windows. We do however have plans to bring it to other platforms.

What are the minimum specs?

We have tested Jumper on various machines with the oldest available to us running the following specs even at the highest settings:

Windows 10-11

AMD A8-5600k APU with Radeon HD Graphics

8.00 GB Ram

GTX 960

Donations

A lot of love, time and patience has been put towards making Jumper the best that it can be. Any donations received will go directly into making the game better. You can make a donation by following the prompts after clicking the "Download Now" button at the top of the page.

Thanks for playing!
